Name: Inevitability
About the game: Inevitability is a game where you can build your own starships part by part in a massive randomly generated universe. With ten different factions spanning five alien races you can help them or plunder them for scrap and new parts. Made in our custom game engine built from the ground up! Other features include: Sandbox mode- Explore the cosmos with unlimited resources and no threat of being raided by angry factions. Technology Tree- Upgrade your fleet of star-ships and stations with new parts that you find throughout the universe. Play the game how you want- If you want to be an economic powerhouse making smart trades for new parts and drones that mine for your automatically or a ruthless space pirate that kills everything it comes in contact with you can do it! New free updates constantly- We plan on supporting Inevitability with new features for a long time and have some big plans for future additions. From the community- Extremely receptive to the community. Every one of our updates includes some features either inspired by the community or directly from them. We love hearing for you guys!
